channel.title: 🏢 Beijing Technology and Business University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Beijing Technology and Business University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Identification and Estimation of the Bi-Directional MR with Some Invalid Instruments
item.description: PReBiM algorithm accurately estimates bi-directional causal effects from observational data, even with invalid instruments, using a novel cluster fusion approach.
